Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.DEFAULT_REDIRECT_URL
    Specifying custom redirect URLs is deprecated, the field will will be removed in a future release.
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.KEY_ACCESS_TOKEN
    Use the properties of AuthorizationData.
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.KEY_AUTHORIZATION_RESULT
    Use the properties of AuthorizationData.
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.KEY_USER_ID
    Use the properties of AuthorizationData.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.createIntent(Context, String)
    Use AuthorizationActivity.createIntent(Context, AuthorizationRequest)
    com.pcloud.sdk.AuthorizationActivity.createIntent(Context, String, Uri)
    The option to specify a custom redirect url is deprecated. Calling this method will ignore the provided custom url.

    Use AuthorizationActivity.createIntent(Context, AuthorizationRequest) instead.
